official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of the Interior to make a feasibility study of connecting state Highway 11 in South Carolina with the proposed Blue Ridge parkway extension.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of the Interior to make a feasibility study of connecting State Highway 11 in South Carolina with the proposed Blue Ridge Parkway extension.

titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of the Interior to make a feasibility study of connecting state Highway 11 in South Carolina with the proposed Blue Ridge parkway extension.
